forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun glimmers gently against a backdrop of a cerulean sky, offering a serene daytime experience with temperatures around a leisurely 66 degrees. The westward winds whisper through the city streets, sending a refreshing breeze that stirs the air, though the warmth of the day begins to retreat towards a cooler evening that promises to settle around 57 degrees. As twilight approaches, a hint of drizzle may grace the landscape after 11 PM, and the clouds will gather, veiling the skyline in soft gray tones that keep the city’s iconic views shrouded in mystery.

The day presents itself as an inviting canvas, devoid of the usual fog that often blankets the Bay Area, making it an ideal time for a casual stroll at Crissy Field or a quiet coffee rendezvous in one of the sunny spots along the Embarcadero. Although the wind is brisk, layering with a light jacket or cozy sweater will keep one comfortable during both the warm afternoon and cooler evening. As the city transitions from day to night, a gentle exploration of your neighborhood—perhaps peeking into an art gallery or savoring dinner at a local bistro—could perfectly complement the calm atmosphere of this beautiful San Francisco day.
